    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Potential dividers in light sensors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche Teiler in den hellen Sensoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diviseurs potentiels dans des capteurs légers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divisores potenciais em sensores claros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divisori potenziali in sensori chiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιθανοί διαιρέτες στους ελαφριούς αισθητήρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Divisores potenciales en sensores ligeros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In the figure, a potential divider is used for the light-sensing circuit to produce a potential difference across RB when light level changes</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential divider</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Abbildung wird ein möglicher Teiler für 
den Licht-erfassenden Stromkreis benutzt, um einen möglichen 
Unterschied über RB zu produzieren wenn helle waagerecht 
ausgerichtete Änderungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la figure, un diviseur potentiel est 
employé pour le circuit desensation pour produire une différence 
potentielle à travers le RB quand les changements de niveau légers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na figura, um divisor potencial for usado para o 
circuito luz-detetando produzir uma diferença potencial através do 
RB quando mudanças niveladas claras</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nella la figura, un divisore potenziale è usato 
per il circuito dirilevamento per produrre una differenza potenziale 
attraverso RB quando cambiamenti livellati chiari</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στον αριθμό, ένας πιθανός διαιρέτης χρησιμοποιείται 
για το ελαφρύς-αισθαμένος κύκλωμα για να παραγάγει μια πιθανή 
διαφορά πέρα από rb όταν αλλάζει το ελαφρύ επίπεδο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la figura, un divisor potencial se utiliza 
para el circuito de luz-deteccio'n para producir una diferencia 
potencial a través del RB cuando los cambios llanos ligeros</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Stufen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heller Sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">möglicher Unterschied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">différence potentielle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
